answerText: chirality[10] Chiral carbons are notated R or S in accordance with this set of rules for assigning priority to substituents. Generally, bigger and heavier things have priority.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 6 | 7 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Meso compounds lack this quality even though they have stereocenters. For 10 points each: [10] Name this property of a molecule which makes it unable to be superimposed on its mirror image. Enantiomers and diastereomers both have this property.
